legal.title: Legal Center
legal.intro: These placeholder documents outline how LookLab will protect your data and govern usage when we launch publicly.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.summary: Learn how we plan to collect, use, and safeguard personal data across LookLab services.
privacy.intro: This draft Privacy Policy describes the safeguards we expect to put in place for LookLab customers. Replace this content with the final legal copy before production launch.

introduction.heading: 1. Overview
introduction.body: LookLab will provide automation tooling for social platforms. During the current preview we do not process live user data; the final policy will define the scope of personal information collected and the lawful bases for processing.

dataCollection.heading: 2. Data we collect
dataCollection.body: We anticipate capturing account identifiers, content assets uploaded by workspace owners, engagement metrics, and limited technical diagnostics. The production policy will enumerate each data category and its retention period.

dataUse.heading: 3. How we use information
dataUse.body: Collected information will be used to deliver automation features, personalise templates, monitor performance, and maintain platform security. We will never sell personal data to third parties; any sharing will be documented in the final policy.

rights.heading: 4. Your choices and rights
rights.body: Customers will be able to request access, correction, export, or deletion of stored data in line with GDPR and similar regulations. The production release will include in-app tools and contact channels to manage these requests.

contact.heading: 5. Contact
contact.body: For privacy requests please email privacy@looklab.app. We will confirm receipt within two business days and provide a full response within thirty days.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.summary: Understand the baseline rules for using LookLab during the private beta and beyond.
terms.intro: These draft Terms of Service are placeholders until legal review is complete. Update this copy before accepting customers into production.

introduction.heading: 1. Agreement
introduction.body: By accessing LookLab you agree to comply with the final Terms of Service once published. These drafts outline the intended structure and obligations for workspace owners and invited teammates.

accounts.heading: 2. Accounts and access
accounts.body: Workspace owners are responsible for maintaining accurate account information and securing login credentials. You must ensure invited teammates have permission to manage the connected social profiles.

acceptableUse.heading: 3. Acceptable use
acceptableUse.body: LookLab must not be used for spam, copyright infringement, illegal promotions, or any activity that breaches platform policies from Meta, TikTok, or other connected services. We may suspend access for suspected violations.

liability.heading: 4. Service availability and liability
liability.body: LookLab is provided on an "as is" basis during beta. We are not liable for indirect damages, lost revenue, or compliance failures arising from automation misconfiguration. Service levels will be defined in the production contract.

changes.heading: 5. Changes
changes.body: We may update these Terms before launch. Material updates will be communicated via email or in-app notification, and continued use of LookLab after changes go live signifies acceptance.

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion
dataDeletion.summary: Learn how to request deletion of your personal information from LookLab.
dataDeletion.intro: This Data Deletion Policy explains how you can request the removal of your personal data from our systems.

overview.heading: 1. Your Right to Delete
overview.body: You have the right to request deletion of your personal data at any time. We will process your request within 30 days in compliance with GDPR and similar data protection regulations.

howToRequest.heading: 2. How to Request Deletion
howToRequest.body: To request data deletion, please email privacy@looklab.app with your account email address. We will verify your identity and process your deletion request. You can also submit a deletion request through your account settings.

whatIsDeleted.heading: 3. What Data We Delete
whatIsDeleted.body: Upon deletion request, we will remove your account information, profile data, uploaded content, automation configurations, and message history. Some data may be retained for legal compliance or fraud prevention for a limited period.

exceptions.heading: 4. Data Retention Exceptions
exceptions.body: Certain data may be retained for legitimate business purposes such as financial records (up to 7 years), legal compliance, dispute resolution, and fraud prevention. Anonymized analytics data may also be retained.

contact.heading: 5. Contact Us
contact.body: For data deletion requests or questions, please contact privacy@looklab.app. We will respond to all requests within 2 business days and complete deletion within 30 days.

legal.title: Legal Center
legal.intro: Everything you need to know about how we process data and the commitments we make to our customers.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.summary: Learn how we collect, use and protect personal information within LookLab.
privacy.intro: We built LookLab to automate Instagram workflows in a way that keeps customer data private, secure and under your control. This policy explains the data we collect and how we handle it.

introduction.heading: 1. Introduction
introduction.body: LookLab offers automation tools for Instagram businesses. When you use the platform we process limited contact details, social account metadata and usage metrics to operate the service.

dataCollection.heading: 2. Data we collect
dataCollection.body: We collect information that you provide (account profiles, authentication tokens, workflow settings) and data generated through usage (logs, performance metrics, interactions with automations).

dataUse.heading: 3. How we use data
dataUse.body: Data is used to provision accounts, execute automation flows, improve reliability, communicate product updates and comply with legal requirements. We do not sell your data to third parties.

rights.heading: 4. Your choices and rights
rights.body: You can request access, correction or deletion of personal data, disable specific integrations and export account information at any time by contacting support.

contact.heading: 5. Contact
contact.body: Questions about privacy can be sent to privacy@looklab.ai or to our registered office at 221B Baker Street, London.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.summary: The rules that govern how you use LookLab's automation platform.
terms.intro: These Terms of Service form a binding agreement between LookLab and each customer. By accessing the platform you agree to follow the responsibilities outlined below.

introduction.heading: 1. Service overview
introduction.body: LookLab provides subscription access to automation templates, analytics and account management tools delivered via the web dashboard.

accounts.heading: 2. Account responsibilities
accounts.body: You must provide accurate registration details, maintain confidentiality of credentials and ensure your team members follow these terms. You are responsible for actions taken through your workspace.

acceptableUse.heading: 3. Acceptable use
acceptableUse.body: You may not misuse automations to send spam, infringe third-party rights, violate Instagram policies or bypass rate limits. We may suspend accounts that break these rules.

liability.heading: 4. Warranties & liability
liability.body: The service is provided on an "as is" basis without warranties. Our liability is limited to the fees paid for the current subscription term, to the extent permitted by law.

changes.heading: 5. Changes
changes.body: We occasionally update these terms. We will notify you of material changes and your continued use of LookLab after the effective date means you accept the revised terms.
